sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl

类 Shell

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl.Shell
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IShell

    public class Shell
extends java.lang.Object
implements IShell
    The Shell is used to interpret and execute user's commands. Following sequence explains how a basic instance can be implemented in Java

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        Do Forever 1. Wait for a user input 2. Parse the user input. Separate the command and its arguments 3. Create a new thread to execute the command 4. Execute the command and its arguments on the newly created thread. Exit with the status code of the executed command 5. In the instance, wait for the thread to complete execution 6. Report the exit status of the command to the user

      • printPrompt

        private void printPrompt()
        print the command prompt containing current working dir

      • changeWorkingDirectory

        public void changeWorkingDirectory(java.io.File newDirectory)
        Direct access to working directory for cd tool. Pre-condition: newDirectory has been validated.
        参数:
        newDirectory - The new working directory.

      • readFromUserInput

        private static java.lang.String readFromUserInput()
        To read from user input system.in until ctrl-d is encountered
        返回:
        string containing the text user inputs, excluding ctrl-d
